1_1LWuc6JBhUGrKEAh1aPrPU85dEMcKmg3pS.body:
When you finish your site I would be more than happy to host it if you are unable to.

Check UPnP settings in your router - I found another program had already grabbed 15441 so it would not open until I cleared the settings.

9_1By85xCDz7VyZEq9WjmhtbNaPKimQwhPLp.body:
USA/FLA (Different cities/counties/states have different tax rates, so 50+ different state tables to take into account)

State Sales Tax - 6%
Gasoline/Petrol - $0.33/US Gallon (appx)

That's all the average person worries about. Sales tax and Gas (but Gas is built into the price, so...)

But, we're free to have almost zero social services!
